// Utility for authenticated API calls
export function getAuthToken(){return localStorage.getItem('token');}export async function authFetch(url){let options=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};const token=getAuthToken();const headers={...(options.headers||{}),...(token?{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}:{}),'Content-Type':'application/json'};return fetch(url,{...options,headers});}
